meanings.definition: A tool used to remove pencil marks.
meanings.sent1: I always keep an eraser in my pencil case.
meanings.sent2: Please pass me the eraser so I can fix my mistake.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the eraser for a nut!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an eraser, wiping away all my worries.
meanings.sent5: The eraser danced across the paper, leaving a clean trail behind.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that erases.
meanings.sent1: The eraser swiftly removed the pencil marks.
meanings.sent2: He is like an eraser, always correcting my errors.
meanings.sent3: The eraser at the art store had a mischievous twinkle in its eye.
meanings.sent4: Time is the ultimate eraser, fading memories like old chalk marks.
meanings.sent5: The eraser of negativity, she always brought a fresh perspective.
